item.title: Java good reads
item.description: How Netflix Uses Java - 2025 Edition by Paul Bakker Impressive things. Virtual Threads Web MVC or WebFlux Comparison GraphQL Flexible schema to query data Think in “data”, not in “methods” gRPC Highly performant Server-to-Server calls Think “methods”, not “data” REST ðŸª¦
